name: Popup
description: Styled popup container for menus and dropdowns.

use: you need a styled container for menu items.
you want the same surface treatment as other overlays.
avoid: you need a fully managed overlay (use `menu` or `dropdown_menu`).

theming: `MenuPopupTheme` controls padding, radius, and surface blur/opacity.
accessibility: Ensure menu items are reachable via keyboard when used in overlays.
dont: Use as a standalone overlay without a dismissal mechanism.
